element-citation.article-title: Digital image analysis of Ki67 in hot spots is superior to both manual Ki67 and mitotic counts in breast cancer

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Stålhammar, G. et al. Digital image analysis of Ki67 in hot spots is superior to both manual Ki67 and mitotic counts in breast cancer. Histopathology72, 974–989. 10.1111/his.13452 (2018).29220095
